content: Excluding approximately $633,000 in severance expense, $576,000 of stock compensation and approximately $57,000 of depreciation expense from our total Q2 GAAP expense of $7.3 million, net non-GAAP cost and expenses totaled approximately $6 million, a decrease of approximately $500,000 compared to Q1 and a decrease of approximately $900,000 compared to Q2 of last year. Non-GAAP SG&A expense was $2.9 million, a decrease of approximately $300,000 versus the prior quarter and a decrease of approximately $500,000 compared to Q2 last year.
